metadata.name: The Sycorax Kid
metadata.description:
'Coiled in a midnight vessel for perfunctory sleep, an emissary lurches violently through ink and fume toward another frontier membrane.  To avoid becoming marooned on a crest of bones in the process, looping and matriculated, maintenance of the signal is performed by an obediently warping tarsiform.  Cognizant balance is junctioned as a double-edged key.  With skullish relics equipped, Elspeth is pulled through insipid marshes to appear at the portal magnificent, dripping with time to bestow a boon.'

Pen and ink drawing coloured digitally.

3535 x 3535 at 300dpi
